document.full_text: jury selection begins on monday at an undisclosed location in florida for the trial of 25-year-old casey anthony, accused of murdering her two-year-old daughter caylee in 2008.
document.title: casey anthony trial jury selection set for monday
lines_and_colors: jury selection begins on monday at an undisclosed location in florida for the trial of 25-year-old casey anthony, accused of murdering her two-year-old daughter caylee in 2008.
